participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easy-going, enjoys sports and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I have a German Shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. My husband is adopted. I like to watch NHL hockey.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and social, with a passion for cars and a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: I like to spend my money on cars. I watch too much TV in my spare time. I have never had a steady relationship. I work from home. I go to the gym most days just to socialize.
